meta.article_title: January 4, 2021 - Play Both Weaker and Stronger Players

causes_communes: Trying to develop new shots or tactics

debutant: Try out new techniques and tactics against weaker players
Develop shots and instincts in a controlled environment

exercices_complementaires.nom: Serving backspin and looping the pushed return
exercices_complementaires.description: Loop against a weaker player's push to develop shot

metriques_progression.reps: Develop the shot and instincts until proficient

erreurs_a_eviter.erreur: Stops trying out new shots or tactics due to losses against stronger players
